title: DP20488 A Long-Run Perspective on Unconditional Convergence in Manufacturing: Evidence from U.S. Industrialization
summary: This paper examines long-run unconditional convergence of labour productivity in manufacturing across 48 contiguous U.S. states. We construct a detailed panel data set of state-industry pairs with over 120 industries covering the period 1880-2007.
